About Me

I am a robotics and machine learning enthusiast with a graduate specialization in robotics. My experience includes leading visual odometry and autonomous drone racing projects at the University of Toronto. Passionate about building real-world solutions, I am driven to innovate at the intersection of robotics, AI, and simulation technologies.

Snack Delivering Trailbot

angular mongo typescript node
  • Sensor Integration and Platform Setup: Integrated ROS-compatible LiDAR, IMU, camera, and servo systems with the Husky AGV platform, enabling autonomous navigation and interactive capabilities.
  • Servo Control Logic: Implemented precise control of dispenser servos using Arduino Due, managing real-time actuation for snack and water delivery.
  • SLAM Tuning and Sensor Fusion: Optimized Cartographerâ€™s SLAM by fusing 3D LiDAR and IMU data, enhancing localization and mapping accuracy for dynamic outdoor trail environments.
  • Human Detection and Tracking: Deployed YOLOv7 for human detection, enabling real-time tracking for interactive and safe robot-human interactions.
  • Trail-Aware Navigation: Developed a navigation commander node based on real-time trail segmentation using a Lightweight Encoder-Decoder Architecture. Trained the architecture on custom labeled trail environments.
  • State Machine Implementation: Designed a robust state machine to coordinate all system components, enabling adaptive decision-making for navigation, human interaction, and dispensing tasks.

Project title

angular mongo typscript node
  • Control System Development: Designed and implemented a PID controller for precise position and attitude control, ensuring stable and responsive flight dynamics in high-speed racing scenarios.
  • Path Planning Algorithm: Developed an RRT* (Rapidly-exploring Random Tree Star) based path planner to navigate through a randomized sequence of gates while avoiding static and dynamic obstacles.
  • Time-Optimal Trajectory Planning: Engineered a minimum snap trajectory planner for time-optimal racing paths, optimizing jerk and acceleration profiles for smooth and fast navigation.
  • Performance Achievement: Achieved the fastest completion time in the drone racing competition finals, demonstrating superior control accuracy and path optimization.

Terrain Traversability Mapping

angular mongo typscript node
  • Custom Costmap Plugin Development: Developed a C++-based plugin for Navigation2 that generates costmaps using terrain traversability constraints, enabling enhanced path planning over uneven terrains.
  • Terrain Estimation and Map Fusion: Implemented a Kalman filter-based map fusion algorithm to improve height estimates of the terrain, enhancing costmap accuracy and navigation safety.
  • Real-Time Visualization: Created a real-time terrain structure visualization plugin for RViz using OGRE3D, leveraging custom ROS message types for detailed surface rendering.
  • ROS Integration and Optimization: Seamlessly integrated the plugin with ROS 2 Navigation2 stack, achieving efficient costmap updates and low-latency visualization for real-time navigation tasks.

Gaussian splatting enhancement with LiDAR prior

  • Improved 3DGS Representation: Enhanced the 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) algorithm by integrating LiDAR-based depth regularization to improve scene representation for autonomous driving applications, especially in sparse data scenarios.
  • Depth Regularization Integration: Infused a depth prior into the 3DGS optimization process to improve depth estimates and scene reconstruction accuracy, mitigating issues with sparse LiDAR inputs and large scenes.
  • Dataset and Evaluation: Conducted experiments using the NuScenes dataset to compare the performance of the depth-regularized 3DGS method against the original implementation, achieving superior depth estimation and reduced artifacts in novel view synthesis.
  • Qualitative and Quantitative Improvements: Demonstrated improvements in depth accuracy and comparable RGB renders, with a notable reduction in visual artifacts during novel view synthesis.
  • 3D LiDAR Point Cloud Segmentation: Utilized depth-regularized 3DGS-rendered images for 3D LiDAR point cloud segmentation, enhancing the performance of segmentation tasks with more accurate depth information.

angular mongo typscript node

Improving Visual SLAM in Motion Blur

  • Pipeline Development for Deep Deblurring: Developed a pipeline integrating deep deblurring networks with ORB SLAM3 to improve tracking accuracy in visually degraded environments affected by motion blur.
  • Keypoint Filtering Algorithm: Designed and implemented an algorithm for keypoint filtering based on blur kernel intensity, improving the quality of feature matching and tracking in blurry frames.
  • Synthetic Dataset Creation: Curated a synthetic dataset in Unity3D to simulate various blur intensities, enabling controlled testing of deblurring and tracking performance under different blur conditions.
  • Benchmark Testing and Evaluation: Conducted extensive tests on the EuROC MAV dataset, demonstrating up to 45% improvement in pose tracking accuracy with the proposed deblurring pipeline.
  • Performance Improvement: Significantly reduced tracking loss in ORB SLAM3, achieving robust and stable pose estimation in challenging, blur-prone environments.

angular mongo typscript node

Multi Robot Planning Optimization

  • Task Allocation Algorithm: Solved the multi-robot task allocation problem using two approaches: Dynamical Adaptive Particle Swarm Optimization (DAPSO) for optimal task distribution and Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) for reinforcement learning-based dynamic task assignment.
  • Warehouse Representation: Created a scalable warehouse representation using a graph-based model in networkX, enabling efficient task allocation and path planning for multiple robots.
  • Robot Simulation in Gazebo: Demonstrated the operation of multiple robots within a simulated warehouse environment in Gazebo, testing the algorithms under realistic conditions.
  • Regulated Pure Pursuit Controller: Implemented and tuned the Regulated Pure Pursuit controller to enable robust lane following behavior for the robots in the warehouse environment.
  • Collision Avoidance and Junction Logic: Integrated collision avoidance and junction preference logic to resolve decision ambiguity, ensuring safe and efficient navigation through complex warehouse layouts.
